title: The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 21
description:
The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 21:

This upload contains 35 titles:

-  Bair - Bull by the Horns; Fighting to Save Main Street from Wall Street and Wall Street from Itself (2012)

-  Bergdoll - Foreclosed; Rehousing the American Dream (2012)

-  Bhide - A Call for Judgment; Sensible Finance for a Dynamic Economy (2010)

-  Calomiris & Haber - Fragile by Design; the Political Origins of Banking Crisis & Scarce Credit (2014)

-  Calverley - Bubbles and How to Survive Them (2004)

-  Charan - Global Tilt; Leading Your Business Through the Great Economic Power Shift (2013)

-  Demoff - Bubble Proof; Rear Estate Strategies That Work in Any Market (2007)

-  Dion - Financial Crimes and Existential Philosophy (2014)

-  Dranove - Code Red; an Economist Explains How to Revive the Healthcare System without Destroying It (2008)

-  Earle - The American Way; a Geographical History of Crisis and Recovery (2003)

-  Evanoff et al (Eds.) - International Financial Instability; Global Banking and National Regulation (2007)

-  Fardoust et al (Eds.) - Postcrisis Growth and Development; a Development Agenda for the G-20 (WB, 2011)

-  Ffrench-Davis (Ed.) - Financial Crises in Successful Emerging Economies (2001)

-  Friedman (Ed.) - What Caused the Financial Crisis (2011)

-  Gai - Systemic Risk; the Dynamics of Modern Financial Systems (2013)

-  Geithner - Stress Test; Reflections on Financial Crises (2014)

-  Gjerstad & Smith - Rethinking Housing Bubbles; the Role of Household and Bank Balance Sheets in Modeling Economic Cycles (2014)

-  Greenberg & Cunningham - The AIG Story (2013)

-  Greer - The Long Descent; a User's Guide to the End of the Industrial Age (2008)

-  Gregoriou (Ed.) - Reconsidering Funds of Hedge Funds; the Financial Crisis and Best Practices in UCITS, Tail Risk, Performance, .. (2013)

-  Higgins - Financial Whirlpools; a Systems Story of the Great Global Recession (2013)

-  King - Losing Control; the Emerging Threats to Western Prosperity (2010)

-  Knight - Panic, Prosperity, and Progress; Five Centuries of History and the Markets (2014)

-  Kroijer - Money Mavericks; Confessions of a Hedge Fund Manager, 2e (2012)

-  Lewis - Flash Boys; a Wall Street Revolt (2014)

-  Lydersen - Revolt on Goose Island; the Chicago Factory Takeover and What It Says About the Economic Crisis (2014)

-  Marco - The Economics of the Monetary Union and the Eurozone Crisis (2014)

-  Marin - Global Pension Crisis; Unfunded Liabilities and How We Can Fill the Gap (2013)

-  Pixley - Emotions in Finance; Distrust and Uncertainty in Global Markets (2004)

-  Roberts - How the Economy Was Lost; the War of the Worlds (2009)

-  Shane - Fool's Gold; the Truth Behind Angel Investing in America (2009)

-  Stein - Stochastic Optimal Control and the U.S. Financial Debt Crisis (2012)

-  Swarup - Money Mania; Booms, Panics, and Busts from Ancient Rome to the Great Meltdown (2014)

-  Vogel - Financial Market; Bubbles and Crashes (2010)

-  Weatherall - The Physics of Wall Street; a Brief History of Predicting the Unpredictable (2013)
